Name: Brothel Simulator üçì
About the game: Welcome to Brothel Simulator , where your goal is to earn enough money to purchase all of the scenes in the gallery. In order to do this, you must master the art of pleasing your clients by teaching your ladies their desired fetishes and keeping track of your regular customers. Up to 4 clients can visit your hall in a single session. As soon as a client arrives, the pleasure counter will start. Keep your clients entertained by moving one of the 4 girls' cards to them. Some clients will have specific desires that need to be fulfilled. If the girl does not fulfill them automatically, you must help her by giving the client the appropriate fetish. If you are up for a challenge, you'll be sure to have a fulfilling and rewarding experience as you work towards your goal of purchasing all of the scenes in the gallery. Features: Players must manage up to 4 clients in a single session Clients have specific desires that must be fulfilled to keep them satisfied Players can train their ladies in different fetishes to improve their chances of satisfying clients Successful fulfillment of a client's desires increases their pleasure meter and the chance they will return If a client's pleasure meter drops to 0%, they will leave without paying and their chance of returning decreases
